attributes.action: Protect the rights of the population over the rights of the feral criminals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current legislation is too soft and completely fails to protect the vast majority from crime and violence visited upon us by the feral youth of the UK.

All previous initiatives such as ASBOs, community support officers and "respect zones" have only served to produce results in a spreadsheet.

Give the Police and the Judiciary the power to remove more of these individuals from society, regardless of age, and return the streets of Britain to the true community.
